tab1.text1: Check the Following tabs for server rules and Server Commands

tab2.text1: - No Blocking Spawns /n - Clean up after yourself /n - please cryo dino's unless breeding to reduce server lag
tab2.text2: /Suicide - Kills you instantly /n /unstuck - Teleports you a close distance from where you are when stuck /n /getuniqueID - Gives you the UniqueID of your Account /n /discord - Opens the Discord /n /ccc 0 Copies a CCC Command into your Clipboard /n /donate - Opens the Shop of the Server in your Browser /n /unstuckcorpse - Attempts to unstuck your Corpse, must be nearby /n /vote - Opens the Voting-Link
